  • Method Details

    • createClient

      @PostMapping("/client/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientRec> createClient(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ClientRec clientRec) throws URISyntaxException
      POST /client/create : Create a new client.
      Parameters:
      clientRec - the clientRec to create.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new clientRec, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the client has already an ID.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • updateClient

      @PutMapping("/client/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientRec> updateClient(@PathVariable(value="id",required=false) Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ClientRec clientRec) throws URISyntaxException
      PUT /client/:id : Updates an existing client.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the clientRec to save.
      clientRec - the clientRec to update.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated clientRec, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the clientRec is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the clientRec couldn't be updated.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • partialUpdateClient

      @PatchMapping(value="/client/{id}", consumes={"application/json","application/merge-patch+json"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientRec> partialUpdateClient(@PathVariable(value="id",required=false) Long id, @NotNull @RequestBody @NotNull ClientRec clientRec) throws URISyntaxException
      PATCH /client/:id : Partial updates given fields of an existing client, field will ignore if it is null
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the clientRec to save.
      clientRec - the clientRec to update.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated clientRec, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the clientRec is not valid, or with status 404 (Not Found) if the clientRec is not found, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the clientRec couldn't be updated.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect.

    • getAllClients

      @GetMapping("/client/all") public List<ClientRec> getAllClients()
      GET /client/all : get all the client.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of client in body.

    • findAllByFilter

      @GetMapping("/client/filter") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ClientRec>> findAllByFilter(@ModelAttribute ClientVMParameters clientVMParameters, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • getClient

      @GetMapping("/client/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ClientRec> getClient(@PathVariable Long id)
      GET /client/:id : get the "id" client.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the clientDTO to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the clientDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found).

    • deleteClient

      @DeleteMapping("/client/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteClient(@PathVariable Long id)
      DELETE /client/:id : delete the "id" client.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the clientDTO to delete.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 204 (NO_CONTENT).
